description: This file is a header file defining private debug and logging functions, variables, macros, and structures used within the RDK logger component. It includes function prototypes for environment variable management, log control initialization, and message logging, as well as external variable declarations and macro definitions specific to this module.

methods.name: rdk_logger_envGet
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a specified environment variable.

methods.name: rdk_logger_env_add_conf_file
methods.description: Sets up environment variables by parsing a configuration file.

methods.name: rdk_logger_env_rem_conf_details
methods.description: Removes or releases configuration details related to environment variables.

methods.name: rdk_dbg_priv_Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down or cleans up private debug resources.

methods.name: rdk_dbg_priv_LogControlOpSysIntf
methods.description: Provides log control interface based on system parameters.

methods.name: rdk_dbg_priv_LogQueryOpSysIntf
methods.description: Provides log query interface based on system parameters.

methods.name: rdk_debug_priv_log_msg
methods.description: Logs a message at a specified log level with module context.
